title: taNikaittala murugan
sahitya:
taNikaiitala murugan tannai aNuginOrin piNi tIrap-pEraruL purindu varugirAn


anupallavi

  iNaiyaDi tanadait-tEDi tuNai purindiDak-kOri paNindiDum bhaktarai aNaitt-AtkoLginrAn


caraNam    kuraipaTTu uLLam kodittiDat-tighaittu muraiyiTTu tannarum urutuNai tanaip-pera
tiraLAgha dinamtOrum varum aDiyAr uyya karuNai koNDu viraivil aravaNaitt-aruLgirAn
